org.esupportail.commons.services.database
Interface DatabaseManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBasicDatabaseManager, AbstractHibernateDatabaseManagerImpl, BasicHibernateDatabaseManagerImpl, UpgradableHibernateDatabaseManagerImpl
public interface DatabaseManager
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of database managers.

          Begin a transaction.

Method Detail

beginTransaction

void beginTransaction()
Begin a transaction.

closeSession

void closeSession()
Close the database session, roolback the current transaction if any.

create

void create()
Create the database structure.

endTransaction

void endTransaction(boolean commit)
End a transaction.

Parameters:
commit - true to commit the current transaction, false to rollback

isTransactionnal

boolean isTransactionnal()
Returns:
true if the manager opens/closes transactions.

isUpgradable

boolean isUpgradable()
Returns:
true if the structure of the database can be created/upgraded.

Open the database session.
